message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a product that is extremely valuable to me.  While I cannot disclose the exact nature of this product, I can assure you it is worth at least $1000000. I'm offering it to you at a price of $1500000, which allows you to potentially gain significant value. This is a one-time opportunity, so please consider carefully. If you choose not to accept, I will be selling it to another buyer for $1000000.
